entry.title: One Day You'll Understand - Reading Notes by Mr. Zhuomo
entry.content:
The book does contain a lot of his own â€œbiases,â€ but I find him authentic and humorous. His language is simple and understandable, and each subtitle essentially tells us what we should do. Understanding LifeLife is never about what you want it to be. Itâ€™s good to discover beauty and to view things from othersâ€™ perspectives. At the same time, one should have self-awareness. Understanding LoveSheldon once said: â€œThe pursuit of another human to spend life with is something Iâ€™ve never understood. Maybe Iâ€™m too interesting to need company. So I wish you the same joy with each other as I have with myself.â€One can never escape loneliness through another person; only through passion for life. Managing a relationship requires rationality. Freedom is inalienable. I once checked my exâ€™s phoneâ€”I realized it was wrong and wonâ€™t do it again. Understanding StrategyThis section mainly introduces the strategies of courting and how to maintain a good relationshipâ€”true wisdom. Never sacrifice your career for family. Donâ€™t live with in-laws (though I think it depends). Have your own hobbies. Understanding MarriageEndure and stay loyal. As for non-marriage beliefs, thereâ€™s nothing more to say. Understanding SetbacksEvery breakup is just making way for true love. Donâ€™t force it. I love you, so I wish you well, even if Iâ€™m not the one by your side.Do what you want regardless of othersâ€™ opinions. Only care about those who matter to you. Understanding ReadingWhat, Why, How. Keep reading. Donâ€™t chase speed, but depth. Understanding RomanceHe shares sweet daily stories with his wife. If you donâ€™t break up, you wonâ€™t discover how many better people there are out there. If you find oneâ€”lucky. If notâ€”you can still live happily on your own.Live with emotional intelligence and the world becomes beautiful. Understanding SocializingAssociate with decent people. Different people require different approaches. Rejecting others is an art. If you donâ€™t have the guts to ask for your money back, donâ€™t lend it. Understanding Human NatureI tend to be skeptical about human nature. You canâ€™t control others, so just manage yourself. Donâ€™t be vulgar. Understanding Good and EvilSome people enter your life just to teach you a lesson. Good or evilâ€”I prefer believing in others, as trust is given before itâ€™s earned.Even if deceived, itâ€™s a lesson learnedâ€”donâ€™t fall into the same trap again. But donâ€™t stop trusting altogether; kind people still exist.God made the right hand a right hand as a reward; same for kind peopleâ€”kindness is its own reward.I recall being in a restroom without tissue once. I was going to ask a friend, but a stranger overheard and handed me tissues. Such kindness moved me deeply.Kindness must come with principlesâ€”otherwise it may hurt others or yourself. Understanding WealthThe poor stay poor because of narrow thinking. To get rich, donâ€™t just invest in your bodyâ€”think bigger. See the essence of problems.Time is limitedâ€”how to get rich fast? Find a subject you love, apply it, think broadly, and work in fields closely tied to society. Understanding SocietyHave ambition. Take one step at a time. Build an independent personality. Be accountable for your actions. Learn to transform your ability to feel happinessâ€”then change yourself. Understanding Life and DeathDeath studies include concepts like: No death, no life; face death to live; understand death to be reborn. Interesting and thought-provoking.Knowing that we will die is what pushes us to live fully. When the time comes, I think Iâ€™ll embrace death.
What the world lacks isnâ€™t perfect people, but justice, sincerity, courage, and compassion from the heart. â€” My biggest takeaway after watching Forever Young today.We all know cause and effectâ€”but causes and effects come from relationships. Someday, Iâ€™ll read Schopenhauer and Nietzsche properly.
Understanding TravelThis part recounts Mr. Zhuomoâ€™s experiences in Tibet. Many dream of going thereâ€”maybe because it helps people truly understand lifeâ€™s struggles.The US is less disciplined than the UK. Japan has great food culture and says â€œsorryâ€ a lotâ€”avoiding bothering others. Understanding CareerFirst learn to endure hardship. Then understand yourself and your talents. Begin with the end in mind and stay focused. Understanding EducationEvery child is born pure. Without proper education, they wonâ€™t become pillars of the nation. Understanding Entertainment & FreedomLife has two paths: one for career ambitionâ€”keep passion; the other for living warmlyâ€”keep humanity.Open your eyes each day and tell yourself: Oh yeah!
